resources/views/components/modal.blade.php:21:            // All focusable element types...

resources/views/components/modal.blade.php:23:            return [...$el.querySelectorAll(selector)]
resources/views/components/modal.blade.php:24:                // All non-disabled elements...
resources/views/components/modal.blade.php:25:                .filter(el => ! el.hasAttribute('disabled'))
resources/views/components/modal.blade.php:27:        firstFocusable() { return this.focusables()[0] },
